flawed_nl_solution:
The first sister has 5 pieces of clothing because 10 / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5
The next sister had 12 pieces of clothing because 10 + 2 = <<10+2=12>>12
The three youngest sisters combined have 72 pieces because 10 + 5 + 12 = <<10+5+12=72>>72
The oldest has 24 pieces because 72 / 3 = <<72/3=24>>24
Nicole ends up with 51 pieces of clothing because 10 + 5 + 12 + 24 = <<10+5+12+24=51>>51
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
